cause.description:
Nobody has to choose between Pro-Life and Pro-Choice, and what's more, being Pro-Choice isn't a black and white position--somebody who is Pro-Choice does not necessarily support all types of abortions or all the reasons for them.
1. Abortion should be more regulated
2. Abortion must remain legal for rare situations that threaten the life of either mother or child
3. Abortion is not birth control
cause.mission: provide a middle ground position on the abortion issue
cause.name: Abortion has to remain legal for special circumstances
